Reviews.Title: Basic phone that works well and is unlocked!
Reviews.Author: JLaskey
Reviews.Content: I have used this phone with a couple different sim cards and in the USA and Europe with no problems.  It is basic but works fine and at the price, hard to beat it.

Reviews.Title: My new brand new "GO DO" guy for my cell phone needs...
Reviews.Author: LuAnne Parrish
Reviews.Content: I am so HAPPY with my purchase from this vender I plan on ordering another one at a future date just so I will have one for a spare. This is the phone I plan on using for the rest of my life because I does exactly what I want my cell phone to do! I don't want to have to deal with an Iphone or an Android or whatever else they come up with, because this little LG is perfect for my needs and this vender is my new "go to" guy! He gets an A++++ rating from me!

Reviews.Title: with some details
Reviews.Author: Nelson Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: very good phone was more what I expected it matches the description in aesthetic reported 100% and works well so far has not given me trouble

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: G. Robertson "Catman"
Reviews.Content: do not want an I phone so this was only choice dealer no longer handles FLIP PHONE  So I will need to bite the bulett sooner or later

Reviews.Title: Works, but arrived and the ear-speaker didn't work
Reviews.Author: MikeinMN
Reviews.Content: The price was right, but for a refurbished phone, I would've expected it to be tested better.  I could talk using the speaker-phone, but not the earphone.  It worked fine for texting.  A little disappointed, but it served it's purpose when I traveled overseas.

Reviews.Title: repacement phonE
Reviews.Author: Sally Preece
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone to replace the same model that I had owned for 5 years. Very pleased with phone and quick delivery.

ProductInfo.Features:
Video Player (supports MPEG4, H.263, RealVideo)
Demo Games - Diner Dash, Ms. PAC-MAN, Platinum Sudoku, Tetris, and World Poker Tour
Bluetooth Version - 1.2
Profiles Supported - headset, hands-free, dial-up networking, general access, serial port, generic object exchange, object push, file transfer
Save up to 10 Bluetooth Pairings
ProductInfo.Name: LG CU400 Quad-band Cell Phone - Unlocked
